summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Consultant Selection Ordinances; amending SMC 3,114,020m 0.040m 0.050m -.060-A and -B, -.070, -.080, -.090, -.100, -.110, -.120, -.130, -.140, -.150, -.160-B and -D through -I, and -.170 to reassign various duties and responsibilities heretofore performed by the Board of Public Works, update a reference to the Consumer Price Index, and include Executive Department offices within the scope of said Code chapter.
